short_summary: Construction services will be required in support of the CFAD Water Distribution System project at 17 Wing Detachment Dundurn.
description: To carry out the installation of a new potable distribution system and auxiliary works which includes earthworks, this build plan encompasses 27 cad operations and approximately 175 centreline lineal meters comprising 399 resource units totaling at 14,118 labour hours (project specific HH are subject to changes).
